segments.text: Why is the car before us stopping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look . Two cars are standing right in the middle of the road and the drivers are shouting rude words to each other . That's why that car stops .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: More and more people easily get irritated while driving .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . This is what is called road rage .
segments.speaker: S1
